17176.「そうですか…… この家に\n おぞましい化け物が 来たというのですね。:
I see... So a horrifying monster has come to
this house.

17177.「ええ……。ただでさえ 老い先短い身ですのに\n 寿命が １０年は ちぢんだ思い:
Yes... I've not much time left and even I felt
like I just lost 10 years of my life. What's
more, my Cup of Vows was stolen.

17179.「今の若い人は 知らんかもしれませんが\n 誓いの盃ってのは 婚礼の儀で使う品で:
You youngsters may not know this, but the
Cup of Vows is something used in wedding
ceremonies.

17180.「うちじゃ 代々 その誓いの盃を\n 作っておりますじゃ。そんなものを どうして:
We've been making those cups for many
generations. What could a monster possibly
want with one...?

17182.「そして 永遠を約束する 誓いの盃を\n ふたりで 交わそう。:
"And then, let us make an eternal
promise with the Cup of Vows."

17183.「そうだ……。あのラブレターに\n 誓いの盃って書いてあったわ。\n ヒメア様:
That's right... That love letter mentioned the
Cup of Vows. Just what is that beast, Lady
Himea...?

17184.「あ………。お許しください。\n あたし つい 出過ぎたことを。:
Ah... Please forgive me.
I shouldn't have said that.

17185.「かまいません。\n そなたらには 話しておきましょう。:
No need to worry.
Allow me to tell you about it.

17186.「しかし あの獣のことを 語る前に\n まず 私のことを 話さねばなりませんね。:
But before I can tell you about that beast, I
must first tell you about myself.

17187.「ツスクルの民は 世界樹に仕える一族です。\n 中でも 秀でた者は 世界樹の守り:
The people of Tsuskuru serve Yggdrasil. Those who excel above the rest are chosen as its guardians, and are granted extended lives
via the forbidden art of immortality.

17188.「そう……私は ５００年前に\n 一族から選ばれた 世界樹の守り人なのです。:
Yes... I am a guardian of Yggdrasil, chosen by
my family 500 years ago.

17189.「……しかし 不老の禁術によって与えられた \n 長い寿命は 私にとっては\n:
...However, the long life I was granted by
that art was, for me...nothing short of a
curse.

17190.「誰も彼も皆 私を置いて 死んでゆく……。\n 愛する者と 共に生きることも で:
One by one...everyone I ever know dies and leaves me behind. I cannot live with those I love... That is the fate of someone with
eternal life.

17191.「……しかし 私は その さだめに逆らい\n 許されぬ あやまちを犯しました。\:
But I defied that fate, and made an
unforgivable mistake...
It happened 300 years ago...

17192.「私は コハクという名の 男に出会いました。: I had met a man named Kohaku.

17194.「彼の そばにいると 心が安らぎました。 \n いつしか 私たちは 愛し合うよう:
I felt at peace when I was with him. Before
long, we fell in love, and...

17195.「ヒメア。ともに 永遠を生きよう。: Himea... Together, we shall live forever.

17196.「不老の禁術を 僕に使ってくれ。\n 君を 孤独から救いたい。:
Use the art of immortality on me.
I want to save you from an eternity of
loneliness.

17197.「それじゃ……\n それじゃあ まさか あの獣は……。: Then, that means... That beast is...

17198.「コハクの身体は 不老の禁術のチカラに\n たえることが できなかったのです。:
Kohaku's body was not able to withstand the
art of immortality's power.

17199.「私は ツスクルの村に 戻ることにしましょう。\n ……コハクのことは そなたた:
I will return to Tsuskuru now.
As for Kohaku...please keep him in
your thoughts.

17201.「この手紙を見てください！\n もしかして これは…… \n ヒメア様に宛てられ:
Please look at this letter!
Could it be...that it was addressed to you?

17203.「生涯をかけて 君を幸せにしたい。\n 神代の間にて 願いが 天に通じたなら\n:
"I wish to dedicate the rest of my days making you happy. If my wish within the Hall of Old reaches the heavens, then let us meet on
that promised hill."

17204.「そして 永遠を約束する 誓いの盃を \n ふたりで 交わそう…………。:
"And then, let us make an eternal
promise with the Cup of Vows..."

17205.「この手紙は コハクさんが禁術を受ける前に \n ヒメア様に 宛てて書いた\n:
Kohaku wrote this letter to you before he
accepted the art of immortality. It's a
promise that he'd marry you, right?

17206.「きっと コハクさんは 心を失った今でも\n この手紙に書いた約束を……\n ３:
Even though he's lost his mind, he must
still remember this promise he made to
you 300 years ago...I'm sure of it.

17207.「だから それを果たすために\n この家に来て 誓いの盃を……。:
So, that's why he came to this house for the
Cup of Vows...

17208.「つまらぬことを……。\n コハクは もう人ではない。\n それは 誰より 私が:
Don't be absurd.... Kohaku is a mindless
beast now. I know that more than anyone.

17209.「それゆえ ３００年も 閉じ込めてきたのです。\n 命を絶ってやることが コハク:
That is why I sealed him away 300 years ago. Even if ending his life was what was best for him, I still could not bring myself to
do it...

17211.「……<pc>さん。\n 一緒に ヒメア様のこと 探してくれて\n ありがとうご:
Thanks for helping me find Lady Himea,
<pc>...
This is my thanks.

17212.「あたしたちが ヒメア様のために\n できることって ないのかな……。:
I wonder if there's anything we can do for
her...

17213.「……天は 私たちの願いを 聞き入れなかった。: ...The heavens did not hear our pleas.

17214.「二日におよぶ 禁術の斉唱の末に \n 私が目にしたのは コハクの爪に 引き裂か:
After two days of chanting the forbidden art,
I witnessed my attendants torn apart by
Kohaku's clawsーleft to die so pitifully.

17215.「神代の間は 変わり果てたコハクによって \n 赤く染まった。私は 彼を牢に閉じ:
The Hall of Old was stained red. I had no
choice but to imprison him, sealing both
him and the Hall of Old for good...

17216.「そして １０年……１００年……３００年。\n 私は コハクを救う方法を 探し続:
10 years passed...then 100...then 300... I didn't stop looking for a way to save him. But as time continued to pass, the more I
began to realize...

17217.「コハクを救う道など…… \n どこにも 存在しないのだと。:
...There was no way to save Kohaku.
It simply does not exist.

45607.「生涯をかけて 君を幸せにしたい。 \n 神代の間にて 願いが 天に通じたなら\:
"I wish to dedicate the rest of my days making you happy. If my wish within the Hall of Old reaches the heavens, then let us meet on
that promised hill."
